section.title: Server

note.para: In the following text version numbers do not necessarily give the final patch- and security-status of an application, as SUSE may have added additional patches to the specific version of an application.

section.remark: Versions will be mentioned via FATE: Apache: FATE#311973: virtual hosting: provide several SSL based domains on one IP address through Server Name Indication(SNI) Bind: FATE#308859: Upgrade BIND to long term supported version 9.6 Samba: FATE#311645: Samba server version update
